data.title: New York Yankees announce 2025 season schedule: When is Opening Day and the Subway Series?
data.meta_description: The 2025 MLB season schedule is out and the Yankees home opener will be March 27 vs. Milwaukee Brewers.
data.text:
The New York Yankees have announced the Bronx Bombers' 2025 regular season schedule, including a home opener on Thursday, March 27 against the Brewers at Yankee Stadium.

The team will play a total of 52 division games, 62 non-divisional Intraleague games and 48 Interleague games.

The Yankees will face the rival Red Sox for the first time in a three-game series at Yankee Stadium June 6-8 and then at Fenway June 13-15 and Sept. 12-14. The Sox will be back in the Bronx on Aug. 21-24.

24/7 New York news stream: Watch NBC 4 free wherever you are

Six Subway Series games will take place May 16-18 at Yankee Stadium and July 4-6 at Citi Field.

See the full 2025 Yankees season schedule below:

April 2025 Yankees Schedule

Thursday, March 27: vs. Brewers at Yankee Stadium (Yankees home opener)

Saturday, March 29 - Sunday, March, 30: vs. Brewers

Tuesday, April 1 - Thursday, April 3: vs. Diamondbacks

Friday, April 4 - Sunday, April 6: @ Pirates (Pittsburgh)

Monday, April 7 - Wednesday, April 9: @ Tigers (Detroit)

Friday, April 11 - Sunday, April 13: vs. Giants

Monday, April 14 - Wednesday, April 16: vs. Royals

Thursday, April 17 - Sunday, April 20: @ Rays (Tampa Bay)

Monday, April 21 - Wednesday, April 23: @ Guardians (Cleveland)

Friday, April 25 - Sunday, April 27: vs. Blue Jays

Monday, April 29 - Wednesday, April 30: @ Orioles (Baltimore)

May 2025 Yankees schedule

Friday, May 2 - Sunday, May 4: vs. Rays

Monday, May 5 - Wednesday, May 7: vs. Padres

Friday, May 9 - Sunday, May 11: @ Athletics (Sacramento)

Monday, May 12 - Wednesday, May 14: @ Mariners (Seattle)

Friday, May 16 - Sunday, May 18: vs. Mets (Subway Series)

Tuesday, May 20 - Thursday, May 22: vs. Rangers

Friday, May 23 - Sunday, May 25: @ Rockies (Colorado)

Monday, May 26 - Wednesday, May 28: @ Angels (Los Angeles/Anaheim)

Friday, May 30 - Sunday, June 1: @ Dodgers (Los Angeles)

June 2025 Yankees schedule

Friday, May 30 - Sunday, June 1: @ Dodgers (Los Angeles)

Tuesday, June 3 - Thursday, June 5: vs. Guardians

Friday, June 6 - Sunday, June 8: vs. Red Sox

Tuesday, June 10 - Thursday, June 12: @ Royals (Kansas City)

Friday, June 13 - Sunday, June 15: @ Red Sox (Boston)

Monday, June 16 - Wednesday, June 18: vs. Angels

Friday, June 20 - Sunday, June 22: vs. Orioles

Monday, June 23 - Wednesday, June 25: @ Reds (Cincinnati)

Friday, June 27 - Sunday, June 29: vs. Athletics

Monday, June 30 - Thursday, July 3: @ Blue Jays (Toronto)

July 2025 Yankees schedule

Monday, June 30 - Thursday, July 3: @ Blue Jays (Toronto)

Friday, July 4 - Sunday, July 6: @ Mets (Subway Series)

Tuesday, July 8 - Thursday, July 10: vs. Mariners

Friday, July 11 - Sunday, July 13: vs. Cubs

All-Star Break

Friday, July 18 - Sunday, July 20: @ Braves (Atlanta)

Monday, July 21 - Wednesday, July 23: @ Blue Jays (Toronto)

Friday, July 25 - Sunday, July 27: vs. Phillies

Monday, July 28 - Thursday, July 31: vs. Rays

August 2025 Yankees schedule

Friday, Aug. 1 - Sunday, Aug. 3: @ Mariners (Seattle)

Monday, Aug. 4 - Wednesday, Aug. 6: @ Rangers (Texas)

Friday, Aug. 8 - Sunday, Aug. 10: vs. Houston

Monday, Aug. 11 - Wednesday, Aug. 13: vs. Twins

Friday, Aug. 15 - Sunday, Aug. 17: @ Cardinals (St. Louis)

Tuesday, Aug. 19 - Wednesday, Aug. 20: @ Rays (Tampa Bay)

Thursday, Aug. 21 - Sunday, Aug. 24: vs. Red Sox

Monday, Aug. 25 - Wednesday, Aug. 27: vs. Nationals

Thursday, Aug. 28 - Sunday, Aug. 31: @ White Sox (Chicago)

September 2025 Yankees schedule

Tuesday, Sept. 2 - Thursday, Sept. 4: @ Astros (Houston)

Friday, Sept. 5 - Sunday, Sept. 7: vs. Blue Jays

Tuesday, Sept. 9 - Thursday, Sept. 11: vs. Tigers

Friday, Sept. 12 - Sunday, Sept. 14: @ Red Sox (Boston)

Monday, Sept. 15 - Wednesday, Sept. 17 : @ Twins (Minnesota)

Thursday, Sept. 18 - Sunday, Sept. 21: @ Orioles (Baltimore)

Tuesday, Sept. 23 - Thursday, Sept. 25: vs. White Sox

Friday, Sept. 26 - Sunday, Sept. 28: vs. Orioles

The latest Yankees schedule, including game start times, can be found updated here.

Sports

The team's Florida spring training schedule has not been announced yet.

The New York Mets also announced their 2025 season schedule Thursday.
